title: Optimization of Marine Propulsion
technologies: SolidWorks Flow Simulation, Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD)
description: This project focused on **Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD)** to model and analyze marine propulsion systems. The objective was to demonstrate the effectiveness and efficiency gains of using a **Kort Nozzle** compared to standard open propellers, focusing on operational context (e.g., heavy towing, specific speed ranges).
